name: Catrifice!
description:
To remove the curse, a sacrifice must be made!

How to play: Point laser with the mouse
Goal: Find more martyrs, remove the curse!

Note: In case you stuck caused by some bug that we couldn't catch, press R to reset the game.

We have developed this small point-and-click-like puzzle game within ~48 by eating lots of munchies and slacking most of the time. Hope you enjoy it as much as we did while creating it!

Game Design & Development: Burak Kürkçü - Twitter
Art: Elif Tavkul - Twitch / Instagram / Behance
